sentences.en: 'stick it up your ass, " Carlo said.
[with clause]you can bet your ass I'll go for it every time.
sentences.cn: 你放心好了，我会自始至终大力争取的。

sentences.en: An ass endures his burden but not more than his burden.
sentences.cn: 驴能负重但不能超过它能力所负担的.

sentences.en: Don't be such an ass, stop clowning around.
sentences.cn: 别傻了, 快别作出这些可笑的样子.

sentences.en: Ergothionine is found in the ampullary glands of horse and jack ass.
sentences.cn: 在马和驴的腹腺中有麦硫因.
打起你那精神来吧,伊坦.

sentences.en: he better drag ass to get here.
He damn well better not try it now or he will damn well get his ass kicked.
sentences.cn: 他最好不要现在就试，否则铁定会被气个半死。

sentences.en: He flipped at the ass with a whip.
sentences.cn: 他用鞭子轻轻抽打那头驴子.

sentences.en: He is not an ass [ a goose ] as they make him.
sentences.cn: 他不象大家猜想的那样笨.

sentences.en: He was generally disliked and regarded as a pompous ass.
sentences.cn: 他常不招人待见，而且被看作是个自负的大傻帽儿。

sentences.en: I own myself an ass, and I await your orders.'
sentences.cn: 我承认我是头蠢驴, 现在一切听你指挥. ”

sentences.en: if you get your ass in gear, you can make it out of here tonight.
sentences.cn: 如果你赶快，你今晚就能从这儿搬出去。

sentences.en: Just play it safe, cover your ass, keep your head down.
sentences.cn: 要谨慎行事，保护好自己并保持低调。

sentences.en: So Abraham rose early in the morning and saddled his ass.
sentences.cn: 于是早晨亚伯拉罕起得很早,备上驴子.

sentences.en: They've really been kicking ass lately — busting places up, harassing everybody.
sentences.cn: 他们最近真是让人气不打一处来，闹得天翻地覆，搅得每个人都不得安宁。
